summary.span: 使用自定义文本布局客户端提供用于为文本设置格式及断开文本行的服务。

span.span: Provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines using a custom text layout client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供服务，用于设置文本格式及断开文本行的文本引擎。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines. 可以处理各种文本字符格式和段落样式，并提供对国际文本布局的支持。 can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout. 与传统文本不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，则与通过回调方法的一组文本布局客户端进行交互。Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods. 它要求客户端提供这些方法的实现中类。It requires the client to provide these methods in an implementation of the class. 下图说明了文本格式化程序客户端和文本布局客户端的交互。The following diagram illustrates the interaction of the text formatter client and the text layout client. ![文本布局客户端和 TextFormatter 示意图](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "文本布局客户端和 TextFormatter 示意图")![Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter") 文本布局客户端和 TextFormatter 对象之间的交互Interaction between the text layout client and the TextFormatter object ## 文本格式设置服务Text Formatting Services 为文本功能，如 OpenType 版式，以及支持运行的文本、 线条和段落级别的功能提供支持。 provides support for text features, such as OpenType typography, as well as support for text run, line, and paragraph level features. 下表是一系列键支持的文本特征的服务。The following table is a list of the key supported services for text features. |功能Feature|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |背景画笔Background brush|中所用的背景色。The that is used for the background color. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |基线对齐方式Baseline alignment|确定在行的基线距离。Determines the baseline distance of the line. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |字体链接Font linking|提供了字体链接通过复合字体使用。Provides font linking through the use of composite fonts.| |前景画笔Foreground brush|中所用的前景色。The that is used for the foreground color. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |OpenTypeOpenType|高级的 OpenType 版式功能，此类备用连接形式和标准连字。Advanced OpenType typographic features, such contextual alternates and standard ligatures. 请参阅类属性。See the class properties.| |字样Typeface|确定字样，以及，粗细、 样式和拉伸。Determines the typeface, as well as, weight, style, and stretch. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |文本修饰Text decoration|提供对支持对象，如下划线或删除线。Provides support for objects, such as supported services for paragraph-level features. |功能Feature|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |流方向Flow direction|该段落的流方向，从左到右还是从右到左。Flow direction of the paragraph—left-to-right, or right-to-left. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |行缩进Line indentation|在段落中的每一行的缩进。Indentation for each line in the paragraph. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |标记Marker|段落中第一行的标记特征。Marker characteristics of the first line in the paragraph. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |段落缩进Paragraph indentation|在段落中的第一行的缩进。Indentation for the first line in the paragraph. 请参阅 属性。See the property.| |制表符Tabs|包括对选项卡对齐方式和制表符前导符的支持。Includes support for tab alignment and tab leader.| |宽度Width|确定最小和最大的段落宽度。Determine minimum and maximum paragraph width. 请参阅方法。See the methods.| |自动换行Word
